title.narrative: Promoting Community-Based Forestry for Climate Change Mitigation and Sustainable Livelihoods in Equatorial Guinea.

description.narrative: To conserve and enhance forest carbon stocks and promote sustainable livelihoods through community-based sustainable forest and land management.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Agriculture, Livestock, Forests and Environment
